ARABIC: قُلْ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۢا بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًۢا بَصِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Allah is a sufficient witness between me and you. He is certainly aware of and sees His slaves.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Tell them: "God is sufficient witness between me and you, for He knows His creatures well, and is well-informed."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them, (O Prophet): "Allah suffices as a witness between me and you. Allah is well aware and fully observes everything pertaining to His servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "God is a sufficient Witness between me and you. He certainly sees and knows all about His servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “Allah is Sufficient as Witness between me and you all; indeed He is Well Aware of, the Beholder of His bondmen.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Sufficient is Allah for a witness between me and you. Verily, He is Ever the All-Knower, the All-Seer of His servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Allah suffices as a witness between me and you; surely He is Aware of His servants, Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'God suffices as a witness between me and you; surely He is aware of and sees His servants.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Allah sufficeth for a witness between me and you. Lo! He is Knower, Seer of His slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "God suffices as a witness between me and you [all]. He is informed about and observant of His servants."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: Allah sufficeth as a witness between me and you; verily He is in respect of His bondmen ever the Aware, the Beholder.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Allah suffices as witness between me and you. Indeed He is well aware His servants and a keen observer.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Enough is Allah for a witness between me and you: for He is well acquainted with His servants, and He sees (all things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say: "Sufficient is Allah for a witness between me and you. Verily! He is the All-Knower, the All-Seer of His slaves."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Allah is sufficient as a witness between me and you. He knows and observes His worshipers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “God is enough witness between you and me. He is fully aware of His servants, and He sees them well.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:96] Say: ‘God suffices as a witness between me and you, of my sincerity. Truly He is Aware, Seer of His servants’, Knower of what they hide and what they manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad, to the people of Mecca: (Allah sufficeth for a witness between me and you) that I am a messenger to you (Lo! He is) in relation to sending messengers to His servants (Knower, Seer of His slaves) those who believe and those who do not.
